dialog.speaker: Grimm (Male)
dialog.utterance: Have you had time to check on that poster yet? I keep wondering if it's come in.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: <Give him the poster.> Here it is.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: You know, you really are a little too persistent about this.

dialog.speaker: Grimm (Male)
dialog.utterance: Would you look at that! The Rizzo's logo is nice and bright, and you can still smell the ink in Mr. Holcomb's signature!

dialog.speaker: Grimm (Male)
dialog.utterance: I can't thank you enough. Still, you can have the bits I was gonna spend at the bar this week.

dialog.speaker: Grimm (Male)
dialog.utterance: And you know what? Take my old tossball blocker, too. Never get the chance to use it these days.

dialog.speaker: Grimm (Male)
dialog.utterance: Sorry, I just get so excited. And I always feel like I miss everything that happens in town while I'm up here.
